item.title: [yone] Blightwing Whelp
item.description:
Creature — Phyrexian Imp

Flying

Toxic 1

{B}: Blightwing Whelp gains haste until end of turn.

Whenever Blightwing Whelp deals combat damage to a player, seek a card with mana value equal to the number of poison counters that player has.

item.title: [yone] March Toward Perfection
item.description:
Sorcery

You get a boon with "When you cast your next Phyrexian creature spell, that creature enters the battlefield with an additional +1/+1 counter and deathtouch counter on it."

Draft a card from March Toward Perfection's spellbook.

item.title: [yone] Sheoldred's Assimilator
item.description:
Creature — Phyrexian Horror

Menace

Whenever Sheoldred's Assimilator enters the battlefield or attacks, exile up to one target card from a graveyard. If a card is exiled this way, you may conjure a duplicate of that card into the top five cards of your library at random.

item.title: [yone] Hexgold Sledge
item.description:
Artifact — Equipment

For Mirrodin!

When Hexgold Sledge enters the battlefield, conjure a card named Goblin Gaveleer onto the battlefield.

Equipped creature gets +1/+0.

Equip {1}

item.title: [yone] Magmatic Scorchwing
item.description:
Creature — Dragon

Flying

When Magmatic Scorchwing enters the battlefield, if there are no nonbasic land cards in your library, Magmatic Scorchwing deals 3 damage to any target.

item.title: [yone] Rothga, Bonded Engulfer
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Phyrexian Beast

Trample

When Rothga, Bonded Engulfer enters the battlefield, you get a boon with "When you cast your next creature spell, it perpetually gets +X/+X, where X is its power."

item.title: [yone] Phyresis Roach
item.description:
Creature — Phyrexian Insect

Toxic 1

Whenever Phyresis Roach deals combat damage to a player, Insects you control and insect cards in your graveyard, hand, and library perpetually gain toxic 1.

item.title: [yone] Arek, False Goldwarden
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Human Cleric

Starting intensity 0

Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, perpetually increase the intensity of Arek and the intensity of all cards named Arek, False Goldwarden in your graveyard, hand, and library by 1.

{3}{W}{B}, {T}, Sacrifice Arek: Target opponent loses X life and you gain X life, where X is Arek's intensity.

item.title: [yone] Bladehold Cleaver
item.description:
Artifact — Equipment

For Mirrodin!

Equipped creature gets +2/+2.

Whenever equipped creature dies, draft a card from Bladehold Cleaver's spellbook.

Equip {3}

item.title: [yone] Contagion Dispenser
item.description:
Artifact

When Contagion Dispenser enters the battlefield, proliferate.

Whenever you proliferate during your turn, draft a card from Contagion Dispenser's spellbook. This ability triggers only once each turn.

item.title: [yone] Darksteel Hydra
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Phyrexian Hydra

Indestructible

Darksteel Hydra enters the battlefield with X oil counters on it.

Darksteel Hydra's power and toughness are each equal to twice the number of oil counters on it.

When Darksteel Hydra enters the battlefield, conjure a card named Darksteel Ingot and a card named Darksteel Plate to your hand.

item.title: [yone] Glistening Extractor
item.description:
Artifact

Glistening Extractor enters the battlefield with four oil counters on it.

At the beginning of your upkeep, if there are one or more oil counters on Glistening Extractor, seek a card with mana value equal to the number of oil counters on Glistening Extractor, then remove an oil counter from Glistening Extractor.

item.title: [yone] Gyox, Brutal Carnivora
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Phyrexian Warlock

At the beginning of your end step, put an oil counter on up to one target creature.

Whenever a nontoken creature you control with one or more oil counters on it dies, conjure X duplicates of it into exile, where X is the number of oil counters on it. Those duplicates perpetually get +X/+X. Then shuffle those duplicates into your library.

item.title: [yone] Ichor Abomination
item.description:
Creature — Phyrexian Horror

Flying, Defender

As long as Ichor Abomination's power is 7 or greater, it can attack as though it didn't have defender.

Whenever you proliferate, if Ichor Abomination is in your graveyard or on the battlefield, Ichor Abomination perpetually gets +1/+1. You may cast it from your graveyard this turn.

item.title: [yone] Mephidross Slime
item.description:
Creature — Phyrexian Ooze

Trample

When Mephidross Slime dies, conjure a card named Mephidross Slime into your graveyard. Perpetually double the power and toughness of Mephidross Slime and that card, then shuffle them into their owner's library.

item.title: [yone] Innovative Metatect
item.description:
Creature — Phyrexian Artificer

Whenever one or more artifact creatures you control deal combat damage to a player, seek a nonland card with mana value 2 or less.

item.title: [yone] Seething Skitter-Priest
item.description:
Creature — Phyrexian Cleric

Toxic 1

When Seething Skitter-Priest enters the battlefield, creatures you control and creature cards in your hand perpetually gain "When this creature dies, create a 1/1 colorless Phyrexian Mite artifact creature token with toxic 1 and 'This creature can't block.'"

item.title: [yone] Skullpiercer Gnat
item.description:
Creature — Phyrexian Insect

Flying

Toxic 1

Whenever Skullpiercer Gnat deals combat damage to a player, a random nonland card in that player's hand perpetually gains "When you cast this spell, you get a poison counter."

item.title: [yone] Vexyr, Ich-Tekik's Heir
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Phyrexian Artificer

Whenever you seek one or more cards, create a 3/3 colorless Phyrexian Golem artifact creature token.

Golems you control have vigilance.

item.title: [yone] Phyrexian Scrapyard
item.description:
Land

{T}: Add {C}.

{1}, {T}, Discard a card: Conjure a card named Phyrexian Scrapyard into your hand.

{2}, {T}, Sacrifice three lands named Phyrexian Scrapyard: Conjure a card named Soul of New Phyrexia onto the battlefield. Activate only as a sorcery.

item.title: [sld] Shivan Dragon
item.description:
Creature — Dragon

Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)

{R}: Shivan Dragon gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

item.title: [gn3] Llanowar Tribe
item.description:
Creature — Elf Druid

{T}: Add {G}{G}{G}.

Sorcery

item.title: [gn3] Ram Through
item.description:
Instant

Target creature you control deals damage equal to its power to target creature you don't control. If the creature you control has trample, excess damage is dealt to that creature's controller instead.

item.description:

item.title: [gn3] Sylvan Messenger
item.description:
Creature — Elf

Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)

When Sylvan Messenger enters the battlefield, reveal the top four cards of your library. Put all Elf cards revealed this way into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

When Sylvan Messenger enters the battlefield, reveal the top four cards of your library. Put all Elf cards revealed this way into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.
